{"id":1243726600,"question_id":3397,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1714271599,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1243726600/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Integer Added to Array I","memory":"42.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int addedInteger(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        \n        int len = nums1.length;\n        int sum = 0 ;\n        for(int n : nums1){\n            sum += n;\n        }\n        \n        int sum2 = 0;\n        \n        for(int n : nums2){\n            sum2+=n;\n        }\n        \n        return (sum2 - sum)/len;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-integer-added-to-array-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
